1015150.name: PrincessGuardians
1015150.description:
■ Play time
about 6~ 7 hours. I think more additions can play for about 6 hours.

■ Game introduction sentence
It was made aiming at a traditional old good RPG.
A fantasy RPG including a slightly near future-like element.
"I protect." it's being made in a theme.
I want many people also to see a story by myself, and I have made it very easy as degree of difficulty of an RPG.
The person who isn't quite satisfactory enjoy an addition scenario after clearance, please.

■ I make a list of the feature of this game.
* With battle voices
* The command system battle (the side screen)
* Fantasy RPG
* Super-easy clearance of scenario emphasis
* There is also an addition scenario after clearance.


■ Production tool
RPG TSUKURU MV

■ Development time
Planning: More than 20 years
Developing: 6 months
